chunk:
INIKA Hyaluronic Hydration Complex

Brand: Inika

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Pentylene Glycol (Plant Derived), Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid), Propanediol, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract*, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Epilobium Angustifolium (Rosebay Willowherb) Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit

(Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract*, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Epilobium Angustifolium (Rosebay Willowherb) Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Anisate, Benzoic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide

Directions: After cleansing, massage 2-3 drops into face and neck, on damp skin. Apply morning and night.

Warnings: Shake well. Patch test recommended. Store below 30°C.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
